com.ericelsken.android.web

Class Request.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericelsken.android.web.Request.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Request

    public static class Request.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for building Request objects. All Requests must be created through this class. All calls on this class will reflect the settings of the Request object returned by create(). All methods of this class return a reference to this so that method call chaining is easy.
    Author:
    Eric Elsken

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request.Builder(java.net.URI uri)
      Creates a new Builder with the provided URI.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request create()
      Creates and returns a new Request with the settings provided by all the calls on this object.

      Sets the built Request to be a DELETE Request.
      Request.Builder get()
      Sets the built Request to be a GET Request.
      Request.Builder post()
      Sets the built Request to be a POST Request.
      Request.Builder put()
      Sets the built Request to be a GET Request.
      Request.Builder setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
      Sets the size of the buffer to use when writing/reading the Request/ Response.
      Request.Builder setData(java.lang.String data)
      Sets the data to be sent in the Request for DELETE, POST, and PUT requests.
      Request.Builder setHeader(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String newValue)
      Sets the header value to be associated with the field name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request.Builder

        public Request.Builder(java.net.URI uri)
        Creates a new Builder with the provided URI. Without any further calls, the built Request will be a GET request to the given URI with the default buffer size and no headers.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the Request.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public Request.Builder delete()
        Sets the built Request to be a DELETE Request.
        Returns:
        this

      • get

        public Request.Builder get()
        Sets the built Request to be a GET Request. If there is any data already associated with the Request, then it is removed.
        Returns:
        this

      • post

        public Request.Builder post()
        Sets the built Request to be a POST Request.
        Returns:
        this

      • put

        public Request.Builder put()
        Sets the built Request to be a GET Request.
        Returns:
        this

      • setData

        public Request.Builder setData(java.lang.String data)
        Sets the data to be sent in the Request for DELETE, POST, and PUT requests.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to send as part of the Request.
        Returns:
        this

      • setBufferSize

        public Request.Builder setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
        Sets the size of the buffer to use when writing/reading the Request/ Response.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - the new buffer size. If negative or zero, this is a no-op.
        Returns:
        this

      • setHeader

        public Request.Builder setHeader(java.lang.String field,
                        java.lang.String newValue)
        Sets the header value to be associated with the field name.
        Parameters:
        field - the name of the header.
        newValue - the new value of the header to be associated with field.
        Returns:
        this.

      • create

        public Request create()
        Creates and returns a new Request with the settings provided by all the calls on this object.
        Returns:
        the newly created Request.
